ISSUE.TITLE: Email "OrderPlaced.VendorNotification" will be send several times
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Store with one or more vendors 2. Order that contain for example 6 products from vendor X 3. OrderPlaced.VendorNotification is active 4. After Complete Order the backend send 6 times (= products.count) the same notification to the Vendor x

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #4989 Fixed issue with duplicates in a search result when a single vendor relate to different order items
